name: IPK European Strategy Ltd
goal: To provide high level strategic advice based on timely and relevant high-level intelligence, to inform technically sound analysis as the basis of political and strategic advice in the fields of public policy.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: IPK follows and advises on all matters concerning global financial markets, including regulatory issues in the UK, EU and US, trade policy as well as economic affairs. IPK also advises on markets and competition matters.
